member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.SqlFragmentVisitor
member.summary: Visitor for SqlFragment and derived classes, useful for postprocessing and optimizations.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.ReplaceTableNameVisitor
member.summary: Visitor to replace old table names with new table names. Used as part postprocessing of the code for fusing nested selects.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.SelectGenerator.TryFlatteningGroupBy(MySql.Data.EntityFramework.SqlFragment)
member.summary: If input sqlFragment is a group by structure, is flattened to remove some nested correlation queries.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.SqlGenerator.TryFusingSelect(MySql.Data.EntityFramework.InputFragment)
member.summary: If current fragment is select and its from clause is another select, try fuse the inner select with the outer select. (Thus removing a nested query, which may have bad performance in Mysql).
member.param: The fragment to probe and posibly optimize
member.returns: The fragment fused, or the original one.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.SqlGenerator.TryPromoteToLike(System.Data.Entity.Core.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression,System.Data.Entity.Core.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression,System.String)
member.summary: Examines a binary expression to see if it is an special case suitable to conversion to a more efficient and equivalent LIKE sql expression.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.MySqlConnectionFactory
member.summary: Used for creating connections in Code First 4.3.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.MySqlExecutionStrategy
member.summary: An execution strategy tailored for handling MySql Server transient errors.

member.name: F:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.MySqlExecutionStrategy.errorsToRetryOn
member.summary: Different back off algorithms used for different errors.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithm
member.summary: The base class for backoff algorithms.
member.remarks: Different transient error conditions require different approaches.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithm.GetNextDelay
member.summary: The default implementation is an exponential delay backoff.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithm.Reset
member.summary: Resets a backoff algorithm, so they can be reused.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr1040
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for the MySql error code 1040 - Too many connections.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr1614
member.summary: Back-off algorithm for the Mysql error code 1614 - Transaction branch was rolled back: deadlock was detected.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr1205
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for the MySql error code 1205 - Lock wait timeout exceeded; try restarting transaction.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr1213
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for MySql error code 1213 - Deadlock found when trying to get lock; try restarting transaction.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr2006
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for MySql error code 2006 - MySQL server has gone away.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmErr2013
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for MySql error code 2013 - Lost connection to MySQL server during query.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.BackoffAlgorithmNdb
member.summary: Back-off algorithm customized for MySql Cluster (NDB) errors.

member.summary: Class used to customized code generation to avoid dbo. prefix added on table names.

member.summary: Implementation of a MySql's Sql generator for EF 4.3 data migrations.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.Properties.Resources.ConnectionMustBeOfTypeMySqlConnection
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The connection parameter must reference an object of type MySql.Data.MySqlConnection.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.EntityFramework.Properties.Resources.NoStoreTypeForEdmType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no store type corresponding to the EDM type '{0}' of primitive type '{1}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The underlying provider does not support the type '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Result type of a function is expected to be a collection of RowType or PrimitiveType.
